problem.markdown:
If Owl somehow increases the diameter of the tree, how will this affect the buckling load of the ‘column’/tree?
(x) The buckling load will increase. ( ) The buckling load will decrease. ( ) The buckling load will NOT change.
problem.p: If Owl somehow increases the diameter of the tree, how will this affect the buckling load of the ‘column’/tree?

choicegroup.choice: The buckling load will NOT change.
